00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   BTSP result structure and methods
00003  *
00004  * Bottleneck traveling salesman problem results structure.
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup lib
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "btsp.h"
00011 
00012 /****************************************************************************
00013  * Public function implementations
00014  ****************************************************************************/
00015 int
00016 arrow_btsp_result_init(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_btsp_result *result)
00017 {
00018     int i;
00019     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(problem->size, &(result->tour)))
00020     {
00021         result = NULL;
00022         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00023     }
00024     result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00025     result->obj_value = INT_MAX;
00026     result->tour_length = DBL_MAX;
00027     result->bin_search_steps = 0;
00028     
00029     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00030     {
00031         result->solver_attempts[i] = 0;
00032         result->solver_time[i] = 0.0;
00033     }
00034     
00035     result->total_time = 0.0;
00036     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void 
00040 arrow_btsp_result_destruct(arrow_btsp_result *result)
00041 {
00042     if(result->tour != NULL)
00043         free(result->tour);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void
00047 arrow_btsp_result_print_xml(arrow_btsp_result *result, FILE *out)
00048 {
00049     int i;
00050     double avg_time;
00051     
00052     arrow_xml_element_bool("found_tour", result->found_tour, out);
00053 
00054     if(result->found_tour)
00055     {
00056         arrow_xml_element_int("objective_value", result->obj_value, out);
00057         arrow_xml_element_double("tour_length", result->tour_length, out);
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         arrow_xml_element_int("objective_value", -1, out);
00062         arrow_xml_element_double("tour_length", -1.0, out);
00063     }
00064     arrow_xml_element_bool("optimal", result->optimal, out);
00065     arrow_xml_element_int("bin_search_steps", result->bin_search_steps, out);
00066 
00067     arrow_xml_element_open("solver_info", out);
00068     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00069     {
00070         if(result->solver_attempts[i] > 0)
00071         {
00072             arrow_xml_element_start("solver", out);
00073             
00074             arrow_xml_attribute_int("solver_type", i, out);
00075             arrow_xml_attribute_start("solver_name", out);
00076             arrow_tsp_short_name(i, out);
00077             arrow_xml_attribute_end(out);
00078             arrow_xml_element_end(out);
00079             
00080             avg_time = result->solver_time[i] 
00081                 / (result->solver_attempts[i] * 1.0);
00082             arrow_xml_element_int("attempts", result->solver_attempts[i], 
00083                                   out);
00084             arrow_xml_element_double("avg_time", avg_time, out);            
00085             
00086             arrow_xml_element_close("solver", out);
00087         }
00088     }
00089     arrow_xml_element_close("solver_info", out);
00090     
00091     arrow_xml_element_double("btsp_total_time", result->total_time, out);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void
00095 arrow_btsp_result_print_pretty(arrow_btsp_result *result, FILE *out)
00096 {
00097     int i;
00098     double avg_time;
00099     
00100     fprintf(out, "Found Tour: %s\n", (result->found_tour ? "Yes" : "No"));
00101     if(result->found_tour)
00102     {
00103         fprintf(out, "Max. Cost: %d\n", result->obj_value);
00104         fprintf(out, "Tour Length: %.0f\n", result->tour_length);
00105     }
00106     
00107     fprintf(out, "Optimal?: %s\n", 
00108             (result->optimal == ARROW_TRUE ? "Yes" : "???"));
00109     fprintf(out, "Binary Search Steps: %d\n", result->bin_search_steps);
00110     
00111     fprintf(out, "Solver Information:\n");
00112     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00113     {
00114         if(result->solver_attempts[i] > 0)
00115         {
00116             avg_time = result->solver_time[i] / 
00117                 (result->solver_attempts[i] * 1.0);
00118             
00119             fprintf(out, " - ");
00120             arrow_tsp_long_name(i, out);
00121             fprintf(out, "\n");
00122             fprintf(out, "   - Calls: %d\n", result->solver_attempts[i]);
00123             fprintf(out, "   - Avg Time: %.2f\n", avg_time);
00124         }
00125     }
00126     
00127     fprintf(out, "Total BTSP Time: %.2f\n", result->total_time);
00128 }
